lead_paragraph: Subtle Aly caught I Promise at the wire yesterday to win the $100,000-added Schuylerville Stakes for 2-year-old fillies on opening day at Saratoga Race Course. Ridden by Edgar Prado, Subtle Aly, a chestnut filly, ran six furlongs in 1 minute 11.06 seconds.
